document.full_text: mr. goldreich wrote a detailed plan for the overthrow of the south african state and once posed as the operator of a farm where nelson mandela, masquerading as his houseboy, plotted revolt.
document.title: arthur goldreich, a leader of the armed fight to end apartheid, dies at 82
lines_and_colors: mr. goldreich wrote a detailed plan for the overthrow of the south african state and once posed as the operator of a farm where nelson mandela, masquerading as his houseboy, plotted revolt.
